title: Snow Storm Brings Holiday Travel Disruptions to NYC Airports
description: New York’s major airports have seen hundreds of flight cancellations as a significant winter storm descends on the city and neighboring regions. New York City is in line to get 5 to 9 inches (13 to 23 cm) of snow Friday into Saturday, according to the National Weather Service. Bill Wadell of AccuWeather has the details on Bloomberg Television. (Source: Bloomberg)
